title: Office Assistant

qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent. Proficiency in Microsoft Office. Excellent communication skills.

title: Web Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced web developer with a passion for creating accessible websites. This position is suitable for individuals with physical disabilities.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Familiarity with accessibility standards.

qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent. Excellent communication skills. Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.
